document.full_text: a day after an air attack on what officials called a militant base in the north caucasus region, president dmitri a. medvedev of russia warned separatist fighters to surrender or 'be destroyed.'
document.title: medvedev follows lethal attack on islamic separatists with warning
lines_and_colors: a day after an air attack on what officials called a militant base in the north caucasus region, president dmitri a. medvedev of russia warned separatist fighters to surrender or 'be destroyed.'
